title: dozerz
author: dozerz
content: lot 1 : 6 x bit-cards all redeemed but a nice biut of bitcoin historystarting bid - 0.005lot 2: copper doge bar made by the legendary bigtimespaghetti, incudes case pictured.starting bid - 0.005lot 3: first edition number 94/100, error the stamp printed upside down lulz! comes with original yellow sleeve in as new condtion.starting bid - 0.005lot 4: denarium 2019 custom gold plated with red b, no loaded value, still sealed.starting bid - 0.005Lot 5: coinographic 2014 1 ltc, address printed under box lid and scammed, another bit of collectible history.starting bid - 0.005STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT 1: 0.001 BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: Wednesday, August 2nd, 2023, 19:00:00 EDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: BTC - bc1qyqw08ea46j3fndx2hnssvta3qhpvdg7hxfex5wSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Damn Dozers...you are parting with some historical physical Bitcoins from way past.    Have not seen Bit-cards in quite awhile and have some in my collection with perhaps one or two still loaded.    They are a must have in any serious physical bitcoin collection as they are up there my early physical bitcoin makers!   And that coinographic does not show itself that often either! Been hunting the chickun one for years and still no luck!    Goodluck with your auction mate!

comments.author: elianite
comments.body: Lot 5: 0.007I actually remember that 094 error. '94 is my birth year, so I must have gotten... distracted for a moment. It only happened once.

comments.author: dozerz
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on July 28, 2023, 07:25:39 PM Damn Dozers...you are parting with some historical physical Bitcoins from way past.    Have not seen Bit-cards in quite awhile and have some in my collection with perhaps one or two still loaded.    They are a must have in any serious physical bitcoin collection as they are up there my early physical bitcoin makers!   And that coinographic does not show itself that often either! Been hunting the chickun one for years and still no luck!    Goodluck with your auction mate!thanks man, well overdue time for a clean up so will start a series of weekly auctions of duplicates and stuff from the vault.i dont have the chikun sadly but will put some other coinographics up, these were a great series and such a shame they were scammed.cheers for the kind words and feel fee to bid on anything that takes your fancy

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Stupid question, are there new updated edition of the crypto coins encyclopedia ? whats the most up dated edition that has the most info in it, or do you need to by different additions to make up the entire history of the coins ?  like the old brittanica/s ?  lol thank you

comments.author: elianite
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on July 30, 2023, 01:56:43 AMStupid question, are there new updated edition of the crypto coins encyclopedia ? whats the most up dated edition that has the most info in it, or do you need to by different additions to make up the entire history of the coins ?  like the old brittanica/s ?  lol thank you There is not an 'updated' version- the paperback effectively has everything up to and including 2015, with some 2016. The hardcover has some extra pages, with notable 2016 additions. OG coins

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: do you think an update will ever come out? it would be very nice to see =)
